ygData.messageBody:
Alex Cordero wrote:
>
> From: Alex Cordero <gemini5719@...>
>
> Well i'm almost level 16 now and I'm starting to look around for info on the
> research skill and so far whound up with useless info, nothing concrete yet.
> So what i wanted to know is there anyone on this list who has a good list of
> the runes and the location to get them or a website who has a good list.
> Thank for the help.
>

You need to go to the Wizards guild, buy a Lexicon and the tome of
Wizardry and any other book sold there. These books all have the rune
combinations for researchable spells. When you get the runes you put
them in the lexicon and hit Combine, and hope you get the spell.

The runes you'll have to get yourself or buy from other players.

--
Qenelin
